articles.title: Trump hits back after retaliation to steel and aluminium tariffs - BBC.com
articles.description: Trump repeated trade threats after the European Union and Canada retaliated to US steel and aluminium tariffs.
articles.content:

articles.author: Kerry Breen
articles.title: Earliest human face fossil from Western Europe, nicknamed "Pink," discovered in Spanish pit - CBS News
articles.description: The prehistoric facial bones were found buried in 50 feet of mud and silt, and are believed to be 1.1 to 1.4 million years old, researchers said.
articles.content:
Researchers in Spain have unearthed a fossil from a potential new prehistoric member of the human family tree, and they say it's the earliest known remnants of a face discovered in Western Europe.
